member.name: T:VL.GraphicalEditor.Skia.Polygon
member.remarks: The relation between the polygons points, its position and its anchor are as follows: - points are interpreted relative to the position - the anchor specifies how the position relates to the points bounding rectangle The two recommended ways of using a polygon are therefore: - either specify points in a way that they assume position is their topleft corner and then use the anchor to move the polygon around in respect to the position - or don't touch the anchor and specify points relatively around the position
